• MSA 17 Boston
  • Read the CFP
  • Post & View CFPs

How can I send out a CFP to the MSA Community?

  1. Announce your CFP using the MSA CFP page (recommended).

  2. Announce your CFP on the MSA Facebook page; use the hashtag “cfp.”

  3. Announce your CFP using the list-serv MSA Discuss at msa-discuss@jhupress.jhu.edu.

  4. Announce your CFP on Twitter using the @msatweet handle and #msa17 #cfp hashtags.

How can I find CFPs for MSA 17?

  1. Look for the hashtag “cfp” on the MSA Facebook page.

  2. Look for a CFP on the MSA CFP page.

  3. Sign up for our mailing list at http://chaos.press.jhu.edu/mailman/listinfo/msa-discuss.

  4. Look for CFPs on Twitter using the @msatweet handle and #msa17 #cfp hashtags.
